channel.title: Cannot login to onion version of the forums
channel.description:
I am able to login to https://forums.kicksecure.com over tor.
I am not able to login to http://forums.w5j6stm77zs6652pgsij4awcjeel3eco7kvipheu6mtr623eyyehj4yd.onion. It gives me an "unknown error." If I click the button to send a login email instead, it tells me error 403.
I prefer to login via the onion link because it is presumably safer / more anonymous.
It is possible that you are already aware of this error, but I figured I would report it anyways. Thank you.

item.title: Cannot login to onion version of the forums
item.dc:creator: qtzvytqr77x4t5cq
item.description:
Yes, thank you for the link.

Read full topic
item.source: Cannot login to onion version of the forums

item.description:
